long_description: With a long runtime and 3 bright white LEDs, the Ultimate Survival Technologies 60-Day Lantern will keep camping festivities going long after the sun sets. 6 D batteries (sold separately) provide up to 1440 hrs. (60 days) of use on low, 168 hrs. on medium, 72 hrs. on high; S.O.S. flashing setting lasts longer than 60 days. 3 1.4W Nichia LEDs deliver up to 508 lumens on high; remove the globe to convert to area light. Built-in recessed hook in the base of the lantern lets you hang the lantern upside down to cast light down on a work area. Ultimate Survival Technologies 60-Day lantern has ABS-plastic housing with rubberized zones to endure impacts.
short_description: With a long runtime and 3 bright white LEDs, the Ultimate Survival Technologies 60-Day Lantern will keep camping festivities going long after the sun sets.
